NESTEA Lemon Iced Tea Liquid Water EnhancerIngredients
Water, citric acid (for tartness), green tea, flavour, sucralose, potassium sorbate. Contains 34 mg sucralose per 2 ml serving.
Chunks of mango and peach slices add fresh flavour and bright colour to these refreshing summery tea pops
